review.review_reply: Thank you for choosing Pinnacle Mike!

review.comment: Simply stated- Exceptional work!!!!
review.review_reply: Glad we could be of service! Thank you for the review Tom!

review.comment: Noah and team were great to work with. Came out quickly to assess the damage and repair, provided me with an accurate quote and handled the repair. Very professional and courteous. Would recommend Pinnacle Roofing to others.
review.review_reply: Happy to help David! Thank you for choosing Pinnacle!

review.comment: They came out quickly and got the job done fast. Very personable and polite.
review.review_reply: Thank you for the review Frankie!

review.comment: Couldn’t recommend this company enough! I called for a free estimate. After they came & found a few issues, they repaired the same day and went above and beyond for me. When chatting with Noah & Brandon on the phone, they were both very kind, professional, & patient in answering every question I had.
review.review_reply: Glad we could help Jerry! Thank you for the review!

review.comment: Noah and his crew did an excellent job in replacing the roof above our sunroom and in repairing the structural and interior damage that resulted from a leak in the roof.  The quality of their work is very good and they clean up nicely after each day on the job.  Noah is professional to deal with, and he took the initiative and did a super job in working with our insurance company to explain the cause of the leak and the detailed costs required to repair.  I would highly recommend Pinnacle for your roofing and construction needs.
review.review_reply: Glad we could help Rene! Thank you for the review!

review.comment: We had shingles come off the roof from heavy winds. We called Pinnacle Roofing and they came out right away! The price was very reasonable. So glad we called Pinnacle Roofing!!
review.review_reply: Thank you for choosing Pinnacle Sarah!
Thank you Mike!
Thank you Bruce!

review.comment: It was quick and easy to set up an appointment. There was a small issue where a previous job they were working ran over, so the appt had to be rescheduled, but they were able to come out the next day and worked quickly and thoroughly. All in all  they did a great job!
review.review_reply: Thank you for being patient Natasha! Glad we could help!

review.comment: Our initial call was returned within a day. The crew kept us informed on when they would arrive. They assessed our roof problem quickly and provided a professional repair. All communication from the crew was detailed and clear. We will now be contacting Pinnacle next year for exterior renovations we have planned.
review.review_reply: Thank you for the review Kathryn! Glad we could help!

review.comment: I am extremely pleased with the work Pinnacle Roofing & Construction Co. did on my home. First, I was impressed with how fast Noah returned my phone call. Noah and his crew are knowledgeable, professional, and reliable. They took their time to inspect the type of repair my roof was going to need, and thoroughly explained the  best course of action for the  repair. What really impressed me was how fast Noah responded to my call and got the job done. Their work is high quality, and their pricing is reasonable. I highly recommend Pinnacle Roofing & Construction Co. for roof repairs. Thank Noah and Crew!
review.review_reply: Thank you for choosing Pinnacle Carolyn! Glad we were able to get you taken care of!

review.comment: Friendly and honest service and quick to respond and take care of my problem
review.review_reply: Thank you for the review!

review.comment: We have had some very bad experiences in the past as I am sure many of you have also.  These people are a different caliber.  The owner came to review the issues with our roof.  Not only did he note the issues I pointed out but brought a couple other issues to our attention as well.  I know you're thinking upselling... this was not the case at all... what he addressed were actual issues that would cost us thousands in the long run.  Any who, they were prompt, professional, knowledgeable and clean.  I highly recommend if you're looking for this type of work give them a try.  You won't be disappointed.
review.review_reply: Thank you for the review Aaron! Happy to help!

review.comment: Very good to work with. Explained how things work and prompt at scheduling service. Called for roof inspection and someone came the next day. Inspected the roof and fixed it the same day. Explained what was wrong and what was done to fix it. Quite affordable and reasonable. Would definitely recommend
review.review_reply: Thank you for choosing Pinnacle Brian!

review.comment: They did good work on my roof repair job.
review.review_reply: Thank you for the review Jeff!

review.comment: Price was great. Called around to a few places. Did the work really fast and they were very helpful and answered my questions. Will definitely use again for future roofing needs.
review.review_reply: Glad we could help Kira! Thank you for choosing Pinnacle!
Thank you for the review Alyssa!
Thank you for the review Becky!

review.comment: Great service. Will definitely call again. Absolutely recommend!! Great guys!
review.review_reply: Thank you for choosing Pinnacle! Glad we could help!

review.comment: Noah was amazing to work with at Pinnacle. He responded quickly to my call, showed up a day later, and got the job done!!! He was very knowledgeable and honest. I would definitely use Pinnacle Roofing again. Thank you Noah and your company for the great work and honesty!!! Five-star recommendation ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
review.review_reply: Thank you TJ! We are happy to help!

review.comment: First- a quick return phone call from Noah.  Next- we told him about our roof issue and he said it was something Pinnacle could take care of.  A mere week later,  the problem was resolved.  The crew arrived when they said they would, got to work promptly and performed the work professionally.  We are very satisfied and would highly recommend this company.
review.review_reply: Thank you Marsha! Glad we could get you taken care of!

review.comment: Noah and his crew were more than great to work with. They showed up and did an amazing job and were extremely professional. I would highly recommend Pinnacle Roofing.
review.review_reply: Thank you for choosing Pinnacle!

review.comment: It was a pleasure working with Noah and his response time was excellent.
review.review_reply: Happy to help John! Thank you for choosing Pinnacle!

review.comment: I highly recommend Pinnacle Roofing & Constraction! The service was excellent from the start. I was highly satisfied from the start when I called and spoke with Noah. Bob was very prompt to come out to our house for an evaluation and was very professional and courteous. Bob took pictures and explained everything to me. We are very pleased with how quickly the job was completed. I will defiantelly contacting them again If I ever need any constraction or Roofing work done. Thank you Noah and Thank you Bob 😊
review.review_reply: Thank you for choosing Pinnacle Mirela!
Thank you for the review Renee!

review.comment: Prompt and attentive professionals. Very organized. Very fair in their charges. Very thorough in explaining work that is done. Highly recommend.
review.review_reply: Thanks Nathan!

review.comment: Absolute professionals from start to finish.  The crew was courteous and explained everything that they had to do.  The work was done on-time and as promised.  Several days after completion of the work, the owner called to follow-up on what was done, and to check on our satisfaction with his team.  A very good experience from scheduling to completion.  I would highly recommend.
review.review_reply: Thanks Brian!
Thanks Bob

review.comment: Team was knowledgeable, efficient and neat
review.review_reply: Thanks Stacy!

review.comment: Very customer friendly and outstanding work completed by this company. Highly recommended.
review.review_reply: Thanks John!

review.comment: Pinnacle roofing fixed a leak on my roof that caused water damage to my kitchen ceiling.  Pinnacle was one of the few company's that got back to me right away and schedule my repair promptly.  The cost was affordable. I would definitely recommend them for any roofing issue.
review.review_reply: Thanks Scott

review.comment: I am very happy with my new roof that they put on in September. Everyday when they left they cleaned up. The last day they went over everything extra good so my dogs wouldn’t step on any nails. The crew was very hard working. They were to come in August but I knew they would be a little late due to all the rain we had had. I would hire them again.
review.review_reply: Thanks Patricia!

review.comment: We have never dealt with a better and more professional group of people than the staff of Pinnacle Roofing. From the very first time we met Noah we knew that he was a cut above the other companies we had contacted. And even though we had to wait our turn for a new roof Noah nevertheless came out to apply a temporary patch until our roof could be installed. He did it on his own time and at no charge clearly demonstrating that he had our best interests at heart. When the time came for the new roof his crew arrived ready to work! And what a crew! Every one of them was polite, friendly and energetic especially the Foreman, Brandon. We couldn't believe how hard they worked and how efficient their processes were. We would recommend Pinnacle to anyone looking for a first class contractor! 5 stars all the way!
review.review_reply: Thank you for the kind words Tom, it means a lot!
Thank you Anne!

review.comment: The whole crew was very courteous and made sure to clean up the job site daily. Brandon and Noah made sure to answer all my questions and explained everything they were going to do/did. The roof looks great! Overall, I was satisfied and would recommend them.
review.review_reply: Thanks Nicole!

review.comment: Roof venting part installation done. Was quick and prompt. Easy to work with.
review.review_reply: Thanks Bharath!
Thanks Matt!

review.comment: Responsive, efficient, and reasonable! Will definitely be calling again! Highly recommended!
review.review_reply: Thanks Nick!

review.comment: Noah, Brandon, and the roof crew exceeded expectations for a new roof/skylight install. Open and clear communication, professionalism, and timeliness were present from quote to the end of the job.
review.review_reply: Thanks Scott, your roof looks great!

review.comment: Noah and the Pinnacle roofing team were fantastic from start to finish. I would and do highly recommend them to family and friends. Walked me through all the issues and options and came with a very competitive quote.
review.review_reply: Thanks Darren!

review.comment: Would highly recommend Pinnacle Roofing. Noah and his team were great to work with - they were professional and cleaned up daily. Noah communicated with us throughout the entire project and was very knowledgeable about the insurance claims process. We couldn't be happier with the quality of our new roof. So glad we chose Pinnacle!
review.review_reply: Thanks Michelle, your roof came out beautiful!

review.comment: This company does some exceptional work, I will forever use them over the years!
review.review_reply: Thanks Mark!

review.comment: After months of run-around from other contractors, I contacted Pinnacle Roofing. They right away gave me an estimate, scheduled the work within days. They were informative and provided a reasonable price for the work performed.
review.review_reply: Thanks Tia! Glad we were able to repair your roof!

review.comment: Very professional, worked quickly and efficiently. Highly recommend.
review.review_reply: Thanks Wendy!

review.comment: They installed our siding and did a fantastic job.  We have a VERY old home and it was not an easy project but they can handle anything.  Through rain and extreme heat they got the job done.  I would also like to add the communication is great.  They showed up to work when they said and did the job they promised.  Highly recommend.
review.review_reply: Thanks Laura! Glad we could give your beautiful old house a makeover!

review.comment: Noah came to the house on Thursday to give us an estimate on replacing our skylight. The following Tuesday the new skylight was installed professionally and cleanly. We would be happy to use this service again if needed.
review.review_reply: Thanks for choosing Pinnacle Patti!

review.comment: I called the folks at Pinnacle Roofing & Construction about some roof repairs at my mom's house.  Noah was very courteous on the phone.  He explained what the repairs would entail and quoted me a reasonable and fair price.  The crew arrived when they said they would and did a great job with the repairs.  I will definitely call on them again if the need arises, and I would recommend them to anyone as well.
review.review_reply: Thanks Demetrios!

review.comment: Noah and his crew have been a pleasure to work with while repairing our roof. They are quick to respond to any questions you may have during the process, and are patient in explaining things in a way you will understand. Super professional.
review.review_reply: Thanks Lisa!

review.comment: After a hail storm damaged part of our roof and siding we didn't know who to go to.  We had seen some work from Pinnacle and felt they would do a good job.  From the first meeting with Noah from Pinnacle we felt like we knew him all our lives.  Noah put us at ease the way he explained every detail of the work.  His crew was top notch and despite hot scorching weather, and sometimes the rain, they worked hard and did excellent work.  Brandon the foreman was always available for questions that we had, and Noah was in constant communication throughout the project.  Noah went the extra mile to work with our insurance company and I can't say enough about how helpful he was in that regard.  We are extremely pleased with the job Pinnacle did to restore our house to better than ever.  I would highly recommend Pinnacle Roofing and Construction to anyone needing a highly conscientious, quality, and detail oriented contractor.  His crew worked on our house like it was their own.
review.review_reply: Thanks Tom, glad we could help!
